abstract: Google said an attack on it and other services was aimed at Chinese dissidents.
snippet: Google said an attack on it and other services was aimed at Chinese dissidents.
lead_paragraph: In a calm and understated blog post, Google said Tuesday that it had recently come under an unusual cyberattack from China. The Web giant said the attack was very different from previous ones because it was aimed at Chinese dissidents’ Gmail accounts.

headline.main: Google Threatens Pullout from China After Cyberattacks on Dissidents
